sentences.en: After forty years in the police force nothing much shocks me.
sentences.cn: 在警察部门干了40年后，没有什么能令我非常震惊了。

sentences.en: Everyone in the street was shocked when they heard the news.
sentences.cn: 听到那条消息，街上所有的人都震惊了。

sentences.en: He was shocked to find his veracity questioned.
sentences.cn: 发现自己的诚信受到了质疑，他很震惊。

sentences.en: I was shocked at the audacity and brazenness of the gangsters.
sentences.cn: 这伙歹徒如此胆大妄为、厚颜无耻，让我很是震惊。

sentences.en: I was shocked, brought down to earth by this revelation.
sentences.cn: 真相的披露让我深感震惊，我被带回了现实。

sentences.en: I was so shocked I went numb.
She was taken to hospital, apparently amnesiac and shocked.
sentences.cn: 她被送往医院，好像是受了惊吓出现了失忆。

sentences.en: The committee walked out, grim-faced and shocked.
sentences.cn: 全体委员走了出去，脸色凝重，大为震惊。

sentences.en: The naked hatred in the woman's face shocked me.
sentences.cn: 那位女士一脸毫不掩饰的憎恨让我震惊。

sentences.en: The secrecy and swiftness of the invasion shocked and amazed army officers.
sentences.cn: 这次入侵的隐秘和迅速令陆军军官们大为震惊。

sentences.en: The whole area has been shocked by the desecration of the cemetery.
sentences.cn: 对墓地的亵渎震惊了整个地区。

sentences.en: The world was, and remains, shocked.
sentences.cn: 世人当时感到震惊，现在仍然如此。

sentences.en: They were easily shocked in those days.
sentences.cn: 在那个年代，他们动不动就对一些事情看不顺眼。

sentences.en: We are devastated, shocked beyond belief.
sentences.cn: 我们极为震惊，无法相信所发生的一切。

sentences.en: We were amazed, shocked, dumbfounded, shaking our heads in disbelief.
sentences.cn: 我们震惊、愕然、目瞪口呆，难以置信地摇着头。

sentences.en: We were too shocked to talk.

words.tran_cn: 令人震惊的；可怕的，令人厌恶的；糟糕的
休克；震惊；震动；打击；禾束堆
令人震惊的人或事物；耸人听闻的故事或小说
感到震惊；震动；冲突（shock的ing形式）
感到震惊；受到震动；堆成禾束堆
使休克；使震惊；使震动；使受电击；把…堆成禾束堆

phrases.tran_cn: 文化冲击（突然处于一个与前大不相同的社会和文化环境中因而感到困惑、忧虑、烦恼的心情）
休克；处于极度震惊状态
感染性休克；败血性休克；脓毒性休克
冲击压力；冲还力；激波压力
耐冲击性；耐震强度；耐冲辉；冲昏力
冲击试验；抗震试验；震动试验

trans.tran_en: feeling surprised and upset by something very unexpected and unpleasant

trans.tran_cn: 使…震惊( shock的过去式和过去分词 )，使受电击，使…感到厌恶[恐惧]
trans.tran_en: If something shocks you, it makes you feel very upset, because it involves death or suffering and because you had not expected it
